structure.unit: County Treasurers, State Supervision Of County Accounts And County Finances

law.catch_line: Facsimile Of County Seal On Bonds Or Notes; Validity Of Signatures Of Officers Leaving Office Before Delivery Of Bonds Or Notes
law.text: If any officer whose signature or a facsimile of whose signature appears on any bonds or notes of a county shall cease to be such officer before the delivery of such bonds or notes, such signature or such facsimile shall nevertheless be valid and sufficient for all purposes as if such officer had remained in office until such delivery.
